name: Uncle Kenny The Game
description:
Uncle Kenny The Game is a retro 2d platformer with fun, fast-paced action gameplay with a variety of mechanics and weapons at your disposal.

BASED OFF OF THE ANIMATED WEB-SERIES ON THE "MAGIK CHEESE" YOUTUBE CHANNEL!

* Controller support: Full controller support with its own unique control scheme
* A varied and energetic OST: Which should be on the market as DLC very soon!
* Swingshot: a tool utilized by Uncle Kenny to swing his way through several areas while fighting off enemies simultaneously
* Fun Shoot 'em up Gameplay: Which evolves as Uncle Kenny furthers his collection of weapons!

ACT 2 is coming as a free update in April or May!

ACT 3 is coming as a free update in June or July!

Note From The Developer: Thanks for checking out my game! I've dreamed of becoming a developer since a very young age. Through working on The Uncle Kenny Game, I've learned to code as well as design which is a dream come true for me. I really hope you enjoy and most importantly...

I WOULD BE HAPPY TO READ ANY COMMENTS, SUGGESTIONS, OR REPORTS BUGS/GLITCHES EITHER IN A REVIEW OR STEAM DISCUSSION!!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!
